item.title: RabbitMQ
item.description: _______________ < Im not rabbit!! > --------------- \ ^__^ \ (oo)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ ||----w | || || Today in office, in order to demonstrate a proof of concept (POC) related to message queues, had to spin up a rabbitmq server. “Play with Docker” come to the rescue. In couple of minutes environment is up and ready. docker run -d \ --hostname rabbit-host \ --name rabbit-container \ -p 80:15672 \ -p 5672:5672 \ -e RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_USER="rabbit" \ -e RABBITMQ_DEFAULT_PASS="carrot" \ rabbitmq:3-management PORT Description 15672 RabbitMQ Management console uses PORT 15672 for RabbitMQ version 3.
